bug.author: QBoulanger
bug.summary: Starting OpenPose Python Wrapper... ERROR: unknown command line flag 'body_disable'
bug.description: Hi! I have the following errors when running the example: 07_hand_from_image.py: Starting OpenPose Python Wrapper... ERROR: unknown command line flag 'body_disable' What should I do? Best regards,

comments.comment:
Hi! I fixed this problem by replacing
params["body_disable"] = True
by
params["body"]= 0
I guess it's an error in the example... I hope it will help someone...
Thanks! I will fix that typo in the next commit!
